text: @jimsciutto And.... When was this?? Come to Seattle, POS POTUS.Visit victims of Coronavirus. Look at the empty restaurants and stores. Anyone who can, working from home. Go to Costco and try to buy toilet paper. Oh wait, you are over 60, you are more vulnerable to Coronavirus. Come anyway.
